name: Instant Pot Mushroom Tetrazzini
description: Instant Pot Mushroom Tetrazzini. Simple Creamy Comforting Pasta dinner with simple pantry ingredients. 1 Pot Tetrazzini. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be nutfree Glutenfree.

video.name: INSTANT POT MUSHROOM TETRAZZINI | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Instant Pot Mushroom Tetrazzini. Creamy Comforting 1 Pot Dinner. Stove top instructions on post. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/09/instant-pot-mushroom-tetrazzini.html
My Books: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

Simple Creamy Comforting Pasta dinner with pantry ingredients. Ready within minutes! The sauce is like bechamel sauce with a roux. I use cashew cream for a cheesy creamy thickness. Usually you would cook the noodles separately, cook the mushrooms, veggies or meat, then mix the lot, top with cheese and breadcrumbs and bake. Thatâ€™s a lot of dishes and time! This tetrazzini gets made in the Instant pot Pressure Cooker.

Saute the mushrooms, then roast the flour for a roux, add broth and noodles and close the lid. Meanwhile, prep your garnishes and dinner is ready. I like to add toasted breadcrumb topping to the dish as the texture and flavor makes it feel like it is a baked dish that has hours put into it :). You can use any other toppings of choice,some vegan parm, vegan cheese (add when hot so it melts), fresh herbs, black pepper or pepper flakes.

recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp vegan butter or olive oil
1 tsp dried parsley ( or use italian blend)
1/2 to 3/4 tsp salt ((depends on the veggie broth, use 3/4 tsp if using water))
1/4 cup thick cashew cream ((blend a 1/4 cup cashews with 1/4 cup water until smooth))
1/4 cup toasted breadcrumbs ((toast in 1 tsp olive oil until golden) for garnish)
vegan parmesan  (as needed or use nutritional yeast)
1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley or basil

recipeInstructions.text: Press Saute on the Instant Pot. Add oil when hot. Add mushrooms, onion, a good pinch of salt and cook for 3 mins, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Press Saute on the Instant Pot. Add oil when hot. Add mushrooms, onion, a good pinch of salt and cook for 3 mins, stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Deglaze with 2 tbsp water or white wine and continue to cook for another min. Remove the mushrooms from pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Deglaze with 2 tbsp water or white wine and continue to cook for another min. Remove the mushrooms from pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Add vegan butter and flour and cook for a min, stir frequently. (Alternately, Skip this step and use more non dairy cream in the end for creamier pasta. flour can tend to burn easily in IP).
recipeInstructions.name: Add vegan butter and flour and cook for a min, stir frequently. (Alternately, Skip this step and use more non dairy cream in the end for creamier pasta. flour can tend to burn easily in IP).

recipeInstructions.text: Add broth, herbs, salt and mix in and bring to a boil. Mix well so that the roasted flour mixes gets picked up from the pan and mixes in. The stuck flour can cause burn error if not mixed in. (You can also add 1/2 cup soycurls/ vegan chicken here. Add a 1/2 cup more liquid for soycurls).
recipeInstructions.name: Add broth, herbs, salt and mix in and bring to a boil. Mix well so that the roasted flour mixes gets picked up from the pan and mixes in. The stuck flour can cause burn error if not mixed in. (You can also add 1/2 cup soycurls/ vegan chicken here. Add a 1/2 cup more liquid for soycurls).

recipeInstructions.text: Cancel saute. Add broken noodles and submerge in the mix. Add 1/3 cup water on top on the noodles to ensure enough covering liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Cancel saute. Add broken noodles and submerge in the mix. Add 1/3 cup water on top on the noodles to ensure enough covering liquid.

recipeInstructions.text: Close the lid and pressure cook for 4 mins (manual hi pressure). Quick Release carefully after 3-4Â  mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Close the lid and pressure cook for 4 mins (manual hi pressure). Quick Release carefully after 3-4Â  mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cashew cream to the noodles and mix well. Bring to just about a simmer on saute if needed. You can also add some green peas into the hot pasta at this point. Mix in half of the mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cashew cream to the noodles and mix well. Bring to just about a simmer on saute if needed. You can also add some green peas into the hot pasta at this point. Mix in half of the mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and flavor.Â Remove noodles from the pot as the pot is still hot and will continue to cook the noodles. Mix in the mushrooms, Garnish with toasted breadcrumbs, vegan parm and parsley or basil and pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and flavor.Â Remove noodles from the pot as the pot is still hot and will continue to cook the noodles. Mix in the mushrooms, Garnish with toasted breadcrumbs, vegan parm and parsley or basil and pepper flakes.

keywords: instant pot tetrazzini, vegan chicken tetrazzini, vegan tetrazzini
